text: Giulio Romano (c. 1499 â€“ November 1, 1546) was an Italian painter and architect. He was a pupil of Raphael. His differences from high Renaissance classicism help define the 16th century style known as Mannerism. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters Category:1499 births Category:1546 deaths Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian architects
